name: The Great Crate Caper
description:
made for the Brackeys 2021 V2 gamejam.

After learning the position of a precious jewel, you set out to steal it! Thanks to a trusty offhand news drop, they happened to compare its price to crates, a subject you know well. Worth 999999 crates you say? 999998 crates to work with then.

Controls:

  •  Arrow Keys/WASD - movement
  • Space - Legendairy box kick 
  • Left Click - Fire the BBBG (Bombastic Box Barrage Gun) 
  •  R - reset

The resolution got broken during export so don't use fullscreen.

Expect nothing

Credits: 

  • Lead: SmeagolDaRegal 
  • Level design: PippinRope 
  • Art: FGH 
  • Music: Duh8055Man
